this_title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta Season 8
trans_title: 亚特兰大娇妻 第八季
introduction: Kandi and Todd receive exciting news during a visit with Dr. Jackie, while Cynthia discovers a video of Peter that's gone viral featuring him in a compromising position. Porsha's new and much younger boyfriend Duke comes to Atlanta for a romantic visit, and Phaedra adjusts to life as a single mom and contemplates a major decision regarding her marriage. Kenya's new house proves to be a real piece of work and despite her personal problems, Cynthia throws a fabulous event to celebrate the launch of her eyewear line. At the party, plenty of 'shade' is thrown when the ...

foreign_title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta Season 8
